questions.questionText: Rhonda has 12 marbles more than Douglas. Douglas has 6 marbles m,ore than Bertha. Rhonda has twice as many marbles as Bertha has. How many marbles does Douglas have?

answerOptions.answerText: Douglas has 2. Bertha has 34. Rhonda has 3
Douglas has 6. Bertha has 12. Rhonda has 1
Douglas has 24. Bertha has 18. Rhonda has 36
Douglas has 28. Bertha has 34. Rhonda has 3

questions.questionText: Bob has 8 pigeons. Sam has 432 pigeons. How many pigeons do they have together?
Dorothy has 12 cats and Shirley has 13 cats. How many more cats does Shirley have than Dorothy?
A day has 24 hours. Matthew spent 14 of them sleeping. How many hours are left in the day?
Your mom gives you 10 dollars. If you spend 3 dollars, how many dollars do you have?
